titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Jessie Graham Stewart, [zw. 1. 10. u. 9. 11. 1938]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

2010/04/29: Title changed from "AN MRS. STEWART, [zw. 1. u. 9. 11. 1938]" to "AN MRS. STEWART, [zw. 1. 10. u. 9. 11. 1938]". Reason: Monk (1990, 412) speaks about October 1938 (and not November 1938).
2010/05/31: Facsimiles added, thanks to Gabriel Citron-

div.p: I must apologise for an untruth I told you today in Miss Pate's office. I said that I had seen Mrs Thomson recently in Birmingham; & only when I came home this evening it occured to me that this wasn't true at all. I stayed with the Bachtins a few weeks ago in Birmingham & I tried to see Mrs Thomson & we had a talk on the phone; but I wasn't able to see her. When I talked to you this afternoon what was in my head was that I had seen Mrs Thomson at your house before she went to Birmingham. Please forgive my stupidity.
